description.value:
The Patron you choose lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

The Genie
Spell LevelGenie SpellsDao Spells
cantrip@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.C3uvPVk3rv4o9IB0]{Resistance}@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.kkeLJayZRFwWyJoJ]{Mold Earth}
1st@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.DVQtVWLYBaVkqvxn]{Detect Evil and Good}@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.FiVh5yBuND9KDDkA]{Sanctuary}
2nd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.F2efriniToiMPjfv]{Phantasmal Force}@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.NvKRfSFIklUcvpLo]{Spike Growth}
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.Mkc8KmoY1rKxdvBN]{Create Food and Water}@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.FDvPBQmEdFxEHdCW]{Meld into Stone}
4th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.ozU4bhqJNftYetM6]{Phantasmal Killer}@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.GRqJitfGa6gc66qy]{Stone Shape}
